duties_responsibilities.duty: Write and optimize T-SQL stored procedures for efficient data processing and manipulation.
Work with business partners to understand their requirements and translate them into effective SQL code and reports.
Develop, maintain, and troubleshoot SSIS packages for data loading and integrity checks.
Create and maintain SSRS reports to present and visualize data for internal stakeholders.
Contribute to the transition from SSRS to Power BI by acquiring and applying skills in the new platform.
Provide production support and BA work, collaborating with internal stakeholders to address SQL-related concerns and requirements.
